dcterms:description: The Pascal VOC 2012 dataset is a benchmark for semantic segmentation, providing a comprehensive evaluation for new segmentation approaches.
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC 2012

dcterms:description: The Pascal Context dataset is used to assess performance on a dataset with different characteristics, focusing on contextual information for object detection and segmentation.
dcterms:title: Pascal Context

dcterms:creator: T.-Y. Lin

dcterms:description: The Microsoft COCO dataset is utilized for training with a focus on common objects in context, providing a large-scale dataset for object detection and segmentation.
dcterms:title: Microsoft COCO
